name: daidai

text: Onstad: satisfying our craving for flacid squirrel cock.

name: autrepoupee
text:
I would assume that to be the sheath.

This assumption has not served me well throughout the years.

name: puguglypress
text: I saw it as the highlighted underside of his ballsack

name: hamscout
text: No it 'taint.

name: cracklewater
text:
I think his body (and those of other squirrels) can sometimes bend light around itself in order to highlight edges. You sometimes see this effect when Todd's nose has his head as a background.

You might actually be looking at his pepper's tiny event horizon. Or is more like (in an astronomical sense) the terminator?

Also: SPOOCHFCH'A!

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Why you got to even say a thing

name: cracklewater
text:
mostly because it's strangely nononomatopoeiac sound effect for Achewood.

It seems more like conceptual onomatopoeia. Maybe even magical realist onomatopoeia, where the sound effect represents the feeling and spirit behind the action, rather than its actual sound.

name: deus
text: Its just a prick.

name: lexsenthur
text: I haven't even the faintest idea what squirrel cock looks like. Wild America with Marty Stouffer only showed chipmunks humping when I was a kid.

text: Daidai goddamn it why did you beat me to this.

text: yeah i was going to claim this as my strip and link it in my sig :_(

name: nice-on-water
text: >pat autrepoupee on shoulder, give a warm smile, sympathetic eyebrows

name: nice-on-water
text: When I saw the last panel, I was basically interpreting this as Onstad saying "So, you chucklefucks didn't like my last foray into the ol' magical realism, heh?  Try THIS shit on for size!" and found it extremely helpful that the 'Bar was down and we weren't around to chucklefuck his Choices.

name: nice-on-water
text: For me, it was a "once you chucklefuck you never go back" type of situation.

text: My first thought: "Oh great, another tangent. Tomorrow this will be a story about Ray."

text: Dude, barn-in-package RULED when I was a kid. All pretending to be an emaciated hog eating acorn husks and gravel. Good times, good times.

name: apricotta
text: I'm asking all the wrong questions, aren't I.

text:
Yes. Yes you are, but it's okay. It's like we're all newbies all over again.
Like the first time.

Like, power-hose power.

text: It's a good thing that Todd isn't getting piss shivers, or else Chris Onstad might have to repaint his walls.

name: troy_convers

Welcome back, Assetbar. We missed you.

text: This is a bit too close to the Lash of Thanatos for its own good. No wonder everyone hated Achewood in 2009.
